fingerprint.description: HP Integrated Lights Out (iLO) usually bundled with HP servers
OpenSSH running on very early versions of Ubuntu 7.10
OpenSSH running on Raspbian (Debian, unknown release)
OpenSSH with CVE patch, as seen in Mac OS X
OpenSSH with a version and FIPS mode enabled
OpenSSH with just a version, no comment by vendor
Cisco SSH banner (could be IOS or PIX). The version always seems to be 1.25
SSH banner from a Cisco Wireless LAN Controller (WLC)

5.21 FlowSsh: Bitvise SSH Server (WinSSHD) 6.03: free only for personal non-commercial use
